description: Between its innovative baffle construction and ultra-durable fabrication, our best-selling Stretchdown™ is nothing short of an enigma. Combining the warmth of high-quality down insulation and resilience of a woven with the coverage and comfort of your favorite winter robe, this parka goes to great lengths to give you an even warmer way to and from town.
name: StretchDown Long Parka - Womens
